helper

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.Validator

  • public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which is meant to make running test cases easier. In my opinion it makes the Test-class more readable. Compared to static methods in the test-class itself, this class is more portable
    Author:
    OOP Gruppe 187
